item.description:
There is a room being reserved (1-4 p.m.) just for our Coffee Talk members at Cafe Atlantique.

Cafe Atlantique

Hopefully we will have a great turnout and I wanted to give everyone plenty of notice. There will be great coffee, delicious food and a live band. Since the room holds 15 people I need to know an exact count of those who plan on attending. Please RSVP either Yes or No for this particular event.

Thank you! I hope to see you there!

-Dawn.
item.name: Cafe Atlantique - Take 2
